alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Quay County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 28 at 11:35AM MDT until October 29 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch and snow and sleet accumulations up to one half inch. Winds may gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Curry County, Quay County, and Union County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses will likely become slick and hazardous. A killing freeze will bring an end to the growing season.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; Quay County; Union County
